channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Trees overhanging the pavement making if difficult to pass, 11th June
item.description:
Trees in the garden of 97 are taking over the pavement. It is nearly blocking the pavement making if difficult for people to pass with buggies and wheel chairs. Also people with impaired vision are at risk of hurting them selves.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 97, Springbank Road, Springbank, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Sunken man hole cover 400x400x70mm, 11th June
item.description:
Sunken man hole cover, on the A40 travelling westbound. Immediately after passing Dowdeswell reservoir on the left, approximately 150m before the junction on the right for Lower Dowdeswell. Or Alternatively 160m before the Dowdeswell woods car park on the left. As can be seen in the pictures it's approximately 30m before the bus stop lay by on the left.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A40, Cotswold
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Traffic lights problem, 10th June
item.description:
While I was out on my walk this week I came up to the recently overhauled traffic lights.I was walking from the Cheltenham side and got to the lights to walk over in the direction of Gloucester/Churchdown etc Despite me pressing the control buzzer and waiting for ages to cross,I counted 3 times traffic from all areas came across the crossroads before the lights changed to green for me to cross.Surely this should be changed to allow pedestrians to cross more easily and speedily.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bamfurlong Lane, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overhanging tree, obstructing window/view from sunlight, 10th June
item.description:
On the corner of Somme Road, the bend before the green leading to the dead end of Somme Road. Driving down the road from Ladymsith Road, it is on the right hand side. It just needs trimming back as it’s overhanging out of control.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 25;27, Somme Road, Lynworth, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
